WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="95c199e8fe2f4c9b90db830cf98cbc2a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Vorrei vedere i tuoi progressi nel Dandori.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="1031c9153ccb4fbb9012837f0bb7ef6d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Per favore, mostrami di cosa sei capace.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="61d32e58d2e74041a359a5403d775c3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Uhm... Iniziamo con l'allenamento!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="9dbda1a7f71d4784a62e3e3207303822" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]D'ora in poi, come ricompensa avrai dei...
... [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pikmin bianchi[System:Color name="Default"]!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="29446c679fac466aa81b24c31d6f4160" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]La ricompensa consiste in [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pikmin viola[System:Color name="Default"]!
Se vuoi riceverli, rimboccati le maniche!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GoodProgress_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="2c9924cdfef644408b04ca68ee206064" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ah, te la cavi abbastanza bene.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GoodProgress_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="d4b7ef1f8c6d462189dbe480ac0a236a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]La tua abilità nel Dandori è ammirevole!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_LastOneMin_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="a8619b74eaba44a09ba00225b17aa10b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Il tempo sta per scadere...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_LastOneMin_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="f8609af96d3d4c598290e8efdec0b364" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Su, accelera il passo!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="f0bd15f8189d4633a158e491645840cc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Per avere successo nel Dandori...
... bisogna saper distribuire bene i compiti!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="862b6af7c84e4adab3fa04a531c7451f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Pensa a chi affidare i vari compiti...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="00072fc1aabc4c85ba3f6d1ffdc18008" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Ricorda di consultare la mappa!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_04: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="87ddf11a271f4e9fb3e96af5b0b7fe43" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Uhm... Mi ricordo di quando ero giovane io...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_05: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="129f46d82163496188fc7c20ab4c5bf5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Non è l'ora di sognare ad occhi aperti!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetItem_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6d59c8f4191f4a7fadd2e8951fae0ac7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Per acquisire padronanza nel Dandori...
... usa saggiamente gli oggetti che trovi!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetItem_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="d0bbe671f7fa40b89d49b27d53306d89" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Uhm... Gli oggetti vanno usati!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_SeijinDown_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="5df7c7ce8fee48998a23a16952b867c7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Cosa succede? Batti la fiacca?
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Forse [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Occin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] può farti recuperare le forze...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_SeijinDown_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="f0a09588ae784b1f8c3ff619f60cb1ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]La prossima volta, ricordati dei tuoi limiti.
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Per adesso chiedi aiuto a [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Occin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_DogDown_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="d88d8d47330f46cc9081acdcd9878c20" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Si direbbe che [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Occin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] sia stremato.
[Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Dovrai essere tu a rianimarlo!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_DogDown_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="c4de0f4569ca4023b718d473fe8abdc4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Hai fatto lavorare troppo [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Occin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Adesso devi prenderti cura di lui.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Disappearance_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="2794b9da60af4bb1a04b7b664ccc77ca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Hai perso i tuoi Pikmin!
[Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Forse è meglio [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ricominciare[System:Color name="Default"]...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Disappearance_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="65c9357bbe2241aaa783425d168fb415" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Sembrerebbe che tu non abbia più Pikmin...
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Hai intenzione di continuare in ogni caso?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetCloser_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6b22f861c7d74afda96499ed8bee73c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Trasportala con molta cura.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetCloser_Object_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b324701301664a1a97236f8fb0156c55" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Raccogli i materiali!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetCloser_Object_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="580d6ed478e74995be306b0b6cc1da94" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Quella porta si aprirà solo se prima...
... avrai recuperato abbastanza tesori!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b93f13ddf6e0474da767fa8a5072c13d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Pensa bene...
Come si potrebbe aprire questa porta?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="c18dd1b6eed6437ca0904031a502a880" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Uhm... Recupera [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]3 tesori[System:Color name="Default"]!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="c7d3da0d24464560b9290edfa60177f6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Puoi usare anche le creature.
Non lo dimenticare!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_03: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="89938bc354e540f0ac62f095a5289afd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Allora... Quand'è che cambiamo il circuito?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_00_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="faae8f9ffa2a4ba9aeb39e75557486dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Non serve trasportare i nemici sconfitti!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_00_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="5a33c29b23f54de79662d604bf5bd636" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]L'ordine in cui sconfiggerle è importante...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6e60b3173bb1496aad9e4a52451ef024" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Non lasciare che i tuoi Pikmin si congelino.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_01_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="0fc7a445af654f0ea65a816a018bbd60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ah, fossi in te userei gli accendifuoco.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="e991fffa01c349819c9ba1cde61ac873" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Se vuoi ottenere risultati migliori...
... distribuisci bene i compiti ai Pikmin.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="4066162773a8402eaa1a7b61b0d2e360" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Nell'arte del Dandori è cruciale...
... evitare i conflitti non necessari!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="50989d5f220d4145b657169aa6685ad0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Saprai già che con i Pikmin alati...
... puoi ridurre la distanza dei trasporti.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_03_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="2680d6b5f0b84d62981ebf2b8c679f34" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Usa saggiamente lo spray ultra-piccante.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="8f6f6f599ac24871b1c1939da3a270be" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Se trasporti con i Pikmin alati...
... potrai usare delle scorciatoie.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_04_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="15b8983b2a174f5086a535b78c22846e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Con i funghi elastici risparmierai tempo!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_05_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="abc31d6d11544d8b83fe89a366365701" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Osserva il meccanismo[System:Color name="Default"] con attenzione.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_05_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6d06678d734244fa94576280d6b958b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Credi di poter sbloccare il meccanismo?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_06_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="7577445c285c4901b8709dfbed905f6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Uhm... Come sono fastidiose... le tarlopulci!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_06_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="720820c61d3a4dd99d7e5c7e73b6925d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Pensa bene agli ordini da dare a [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Occin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_07_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="092d4489ae4e4f178aabc66e6bdb3106" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Suddividi la mole di lavoro con [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Occin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
È fondamentale!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_07_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="180ed5e232774a938c4909b107c79366" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Cerca di usare le risorse bianche e viola!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_08_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="8fa75746e95b40b28dd97806d618731e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]E già, che creature fastidiose!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_08_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="49cf1ab9310c42d2a0cb4f620f4a2b9c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Usa i Pikmin viola in maniera strategica.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_09_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b2ba5f0c83064fe59ecc9c271b5e28e3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Pensa [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]a ciò non è necessario fare[System:Color name="Default"] adesso.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_09_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b85112bcb603459b855e5ba5931888e6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Collabora con [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Occin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Il lavoro di squadra è essenziale.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Happy_GuruGuru: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="5516eed58e2b4ad18215219f4e4ba518" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Occin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] sembra in difficoltà...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Happy_GuruGuru_Carry: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="f3cd2bfd2c6f492eaa770a62f6dfc9a8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Occin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], non passerai da lì con quella cosa.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Pikmin_GuruGuru: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="be5aac63cab14a1e98d54c192ff5f7a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Impartisci bene gli ordini ai Pikmin, adesso!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Avatar_GuruGuru: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6cc170a01af4464ab42a99aac330bf98" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Hai smarrito la strada? Cosa intendi fare?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Avatar_GuruGuru_Carry: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="44e7826a190c4ef3b109aec23011bd78" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Non puoi trasportare quella cosa fuori di lì.
